title: Manage Equipment Defect Elimination
description: A supervisor finds a defect on a piece of equipment (e.g., a cracked weld) during an inspection and reports it for repair.

tasks.description: During a pre-start inspection, a cracked weld is found on a loader bucket.
Create a new defect notification in the CMMS, describing the problem and attaching a photo.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new notification is created in the system.

tasks.description: The planner converts the notification into a work order for a welder to repair the crack.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created to ensure the defect is repaired before it leads to a failure.
